attributes.action: Ban of pesticides & insecticides general public
attributes.additional_details: It is clear that the risk of general health is being exposed by the sale of pesticides & insecticides to the general public. Although it is cheaper for a customer to purchase these products that employ a pest controller their health is being exposed & risk of harm to wildlife & life is being chosen other cost.

rejection.details: This does not include a request for government action.  Also it does not meet the criteria for publication so if you do wish to resubmit this petition, please provide a full first name and full surname.
